text: Mill Green is a hamlet in Edwardstone, Babergh, Suffolk, England. It is Edwardstone's main settlement. == Features == Mill Green has a pub called The White Horse, Mill Green Brewery is also behind it. A Smock windmill was in Mill Green, but it was demolished in 1965.http://www.pastscape.org/hob.aspx?hob_id=384908&sort;=2&type;=&typeselect;=c&rational;=a&class1;=None.=None&county;=1150695&district;=100502&parish;=100474&place;=&recordsperpage;=10&source;=text&rtype;=&rnumber;= === Mill Green Brewery === Mill Green Brewery has won a national SIBA Gold Award. It is also on The Good Pub Guide 2011 2012 and 2014. == Related pages == * Listed buildings in Mill Green == References == == Other websites == * http://www.suffolkfreepress.co.uk/news/latest-news/edwardstone-s-mill-green- brewery-scoops-award-1-561523 * https://www.geograph.org.uk/gridref/TL9542 Category:Hamlets in Suffolk Category:Settlements in Babergh
title: Mill Green
